Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.cardManager

Class CardManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.GameMasterObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.cardManager.CardManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<CardManagerObserver>
public class CardManager
extends GameMasterObservable
implements Observable<CardManagerObserver>
Card Manager is a class that manage all the player's action with a card.

    Construct a Card Manager with a specific base production.

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(int leaderIndex) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidStateActionException, LeaderCardAlreadyActivatedException
      Discard the leader at the given leader index.
      Parameters:
      leaderIndex - the index of the leader to discard.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is no leader at the leaderIndex.
      InvalidStateActionException - if the player is in an invalid state for the action.
      LeaderCardAlreadyActivatedException - if the leader is active.

    • discardLeaderSetUp

      public void discardLeaderSetUp​(int leaderIndex) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Discard the leader at the given leader index during the sut up phase.
      Parameters:
      leaderIndex - the index of the leader to discard.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is no leader at the leaderIndex.

    • activateLeader

      public void activateLeader​(int leaderIndex) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, LeaderCardAlreadyActivatedException, NotEnoughRequirementException, InvalidStateActionException
      Activate a leader card.
      Parameters:
      leaderIndex - the index of the leader to activate.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is no leader at the leaderIndex.
      LeaderCardAlreadyActivatedException - if the player has already activated the leader.
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough resources/cards to satisfy the requirements.
      InvalidStateActionException - if the player is in an invalid state for the action.

    • addDevCardTo

      public void addDevCardTo​(Development development, int indexCardSlot) throws CardWithHigherOrSameLevelAlreadyIn, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidStateActionException
      Add a development card to a Card Slot.
      Parameters:
      development - the card to add.
      indexCardSlot - the index of the card slot to add the card.
      Throws:
      CardWithHigherOrSameLevelAlreadyIn - if can't add the card due to its level.
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the card slot selected does not exist.
      InvalidStateActionException - if the player is in an invalid state for the action.

    • activateLeaderEffect

      public void activateLeaderEffect​(int leaderIndex, PlayerState playerState) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, CardAlreadyUsed, NotEnoughRequirementException, InvalidStateActionException
      Activate a leader effect.
      Parameters:
      leaderIndex - the index of the leader.
      playerState - the current state of the turn.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the leader selected does not exist
      CardAlreadyUsed - if the card has already been used in this turn
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough resources/cards to satisfy the requirements.
      InvalidStateActionException - if the player is in an invalid state for the action.

    • activateLeaderInfinite

      public void activateLeaderInfinite​(int leaderIndex, PlayerState playerState) throws InvalidStateActionException, NotEnoughRequirementException
      Activate a leader effect without consume it's use.
      Parameters:
      leaderIndex - the index of the leader.
      playerState - the current state of the turn.
      Throws:
      InvalidStateActionException - if the player is in an invalid state for the action.
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough resources/cards to satisfy the requirements.

    • developmentProduce

      public void developmentProduce​(int indexCardSlot) throws CardAlreadyUsed, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, NotEnoughRequirementException, InvalidStateActionException
      Activate the production of a development card.
      Parameters:
      indexCardSlot - the card slot in which the card is in it.
      Throws:
      CardAlreadyUsed - if the card has already been used in this turn.
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the card slot selected does not exist.
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough resources/cards to satisfy the requirements.
      InvalidStateActionException - if the player is in an invalid state for the action.

    • baseProductionProduce

      public void baseProductionProduce() throws CardAlreadyUsed, NotEnoughRequirementException, InvalidStateActionException
      Activate the base production of the player board.
      Throws:
      CardAlreadyUsed - if the base production has already been used in this turn.
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough resources/cards to satisfy the requirements.
      InvalidStateActionException - if the player is in an invalid state for the action.

    • doIHaveDev

      public void doIHaveDev​(int howMany, Color color, int level) throws NotEnoughRequirementException
      Checks if we have in our cards slot a specific number of card with a defined color and level.
      Parameters:
      howMany - the number of card with this propriety.
      color - the color of those cards, ANY if not specified.
      level - the level of those cards.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough resources/cards to satisfy the requirements.
